meme.title: When they ask to see the baby and you turn around.

headlines.h: Opinion: My cat's new best friend is my roommate's little brother (And You Know It)
headlines.b: Experts urge humans to stop taking it personally and start providing snacks.
The peer review process consisted of one stare, two slow blinks, and a decisive nap.

headlines.h: Exclusive: Government Announces New Standard: “does this count"
headlines.b: Applies to boxes, laundry baskets, and your freshly folded clothes (especially those).

headlines.h: BREAKING: “Two felineous kitties plotting their escape!”
headlines.b: Officials confirm this is being treated as a "meow-jor" development. (Filed: 2026-02-02)
